newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Rotterdam bunkers stable despite barge dip.
newsitem.headline: Rotterdam bunkers stable despite barge dip.

text.p: Rotterdam bunkers were stable on Monday despite a slight dip in the barge market, dealers said.

Rotterdam bunkers were still quoted at around $85 fob. Traders said prices had barely followed barges higher on Friday, when a number of larger players offered bunkers very competitively, so there was no particular reason for them to react to barge weakness on Monday.
"Bunkers were cheap on Friday. The (bunker-barge) differential is just back to normal today," one supplier said.
Total ARA volume was under 10,000 tonnes. This included a couple of larger enquiries.
Hamburg prices headed higher in very quiet trading.
Mediterranean fuel oil bunkers were mixed, but gas oil was down after Friday's slide of IPE and NYMEX futures.
